Articles.Content:
Hi all!!

Used to post as KhaosCorp...forums ate my account, life goes on....

Now that's out of the way ON TO IT!!!

I have been out of the loop for some time...with KSP forums in general but esp the modding scene, sorry to bother like this but a few quick question to try and force my brain going again ya =)

Does 'out of the box' GIMP do .dds textures...if not can someone point me in the direction of a plugin for it....Im sure there is one.

What version of KSP PartTools do I need and where they hide it these days?

I already upgraded to Unity 5...Im guessing this is not gonna work for modding KSP atm....what version of Unity do I need and can I install it along side 5 (already have some personal projects ported to 5...never had 2 versions at once).

ALSO....if anyone has info on how to make these custom parts groups in editor please point me there....would look at mod plugins but cant get monodev to decompile a damn thing and also cant find my key for MSVS...yes I know......

Thank you SO much all!

> 
> Hi all!!
> Used to post as KhaosCorp...forums ate my account, life goes on....

The account is still there.

> 
> The account is still there.

It being there and me being able to login are 2 very different things =P

Tried every form of account recovery like 100 times...still have yet to get a single e-mail...oh well.
